Package org.brentloaf.displaylib.full.Objects.DisplayCurrents.CurrentDisplay.Display

Class Display

java.lang.Object
org.brentloaf.displaylib.core.Objects.CurrentDisplays.Display.AbstractDisplay<CurrentDisplay,DisplayContext,Interactable>
org.brentloaf.displaylib.full.Objects.DisplayCurrents.CurrentDisplay.Display.Display
public final class Display extends org.brentloaf.displaylib.core.Objects.CurrentDisplays.Display.AbstractDisplay<CurrentDisplay,DisplayContext,Interactable>
Display holds the data of the displays to show to players.

    • display

      public void display(org.bukkit.entity.Player... players)
      Will show multiple displays to varies players. Can be used instead of multiple calls of Display#display(Player) or can be used to sync displays between players.
      Parameters:
      players - Players to show displays to.

    • kill

      public boolean kill(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Closes a specific display to the player (only closes if it's the correct display) e.g. if not same display -> display being shown won't close.
      Overrides:
      kill in class org.brentloaf.displaylib.core.Objects.CurrentDisplays.Display.AbstractDisplay<CurrentDisplay,DisplayContext,Interactable>
      Parameters:
      player - The player to close the display for.
      Returns:
      true if the display closed, false if otherwise.
